Interface IIntractable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICamera, IScene, ISceneManager, IWindow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Camera, Scene, SceneManager, Window

    public interface IIntractable
    Created by blakerogan on 22/02/15.

    • Method Detail

      • mousePress

        void mousePress(double x,
                double y,
                int button,
                int mods)
        Called when any mouse button is pressed
        Parameters:
        x - double; the mouse x position
        y - double; the mouse y position
        button - int; the mouse button pressed
        mods - int; any modifier keys that are down

      • mouseRelease

        void mouseRelease(double x,
                  double y,
                  int button,
                  int mods)
        Called when any mouse button is released
        Parameters:
        x - double; the mouse x position
        y - double; the mouse y position
        button - int; the mouse button pressed
        mods - int; any modifier keys that are down

      • mouseMove

        void mouseMove(double x,
               double y,
               double dx,
               double dy)
        Called when ever the mouse moves
        Parameters:
        x - double; the x position of the mouse
        y - double; the y position of the mouse
        dx - double; the distance of the x position of the mouse moved since last change
        dy - double; the distance of the y position of the mouse moved since last change

      • mouseScroll

        void mouseScroll(double x,
                 double y,
                 double sx,
                 double sy)
        called when the user moves the scroll wheel
        Parameters:
        x - double; mouse x position
        y - double; mouse y position
        sx - double; the x axis offset
        sy - double; the y axis offset

      • keyPress

        void keyPress(int key,
              int mods)
        called when any key is pressed
        Parameters:
        key - int; the key pressed
        mods - int; the modifier bit mask

      • keyRelease

        void keyRelease(int key,
                int mods)
        called when any key is released
        Parameters:
        key - int; the key released
        mods - int; the modifier bit mask
